Empire of the Summer Moon is an upcoming American Western film written and directed by Taylor Sheridan. The screenplay is based on the book Empire of the Summer Moon: Quanah Parker and the Rise and Fall of the Comanches, the Most Powerful Indian Tribe in American History by S. C. Gwynne.
Production
In January 2024, Sheridan's production company Bosque  Ranch Productions won the rights to  the book after they had lapsed at Warner Bros.
